casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos RODRIGUEZ 302A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Ms. Barbara S. Blackman, Durham, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos Mr. John F. Carella, Staff Attorney, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Ms. Jennifer Martin, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Mr. Patrick B. Weede, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Mr. Michael Silver, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Ms. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. Ms. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. Ms. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos Mr. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of March 2016 by Defendant Requesting Court to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
